Shawn Mendes is living it up at the beach.
The 23-year-old “There’s Nothing Holdin’ Me Back” singer-songwriter made a return to social media on Sunday (November 21) following his confirmation of his split with ex Camila Cabello after years of dating.







“Gracias @heiner_castillo___m por estas fotos !!,” he captioned a series of shots of himself shirtless at the beach, getting in a surfing session.

The stunning Mediterranean-style residence features high-end interior, four bedrooms and four bathrooms.

Cabello made the call to sell the L.A oasis last month for $3.95 million, right after she parted her ways with beau Shawn Mendes, whom she dated for two years.
